item.title: Board Meeting Tue 21 Oct + Elevate Showcase
item.description: The Board meets Tuesday, then heads to Level 3 for the Elevate Showcase.

item.title: Elevate PI6 Planning Playback – Thu 23 Oct
item.description: PI6 Planning Playback scheduled for Thursday 23 October.

item.title: West Gate Bridge Memorial – 55 Years
item.description: Chair Jenny Acton, Executive and Matt McPhee attended the memorial marking 55 years.

item.title: New Starters: Andrew Maybury & Lilly Zaffina
item.description: Please welcome Andrew Maybury (Full Stack Developer) and Lilly Zaffina (Industry Education Lead).

item.title: Farewell: James Boyd (finishes 31 Oct)
item.description: James Boyd (Full Stack Developer, Digital Delivery) has resigned and will finish on 31 Oct.

item.title: Staff Movement: Lucienne Ebrahim to Product Owner
item.description: Lucienne starts a secondment from Senior Financial Accountant to Product Owner (Elevate Program).

item.title: Table Tennis Finals – Wed 29 Oct 12:30
item.description: Winners of Rounds #5 and #6 go head-to-head for the prize. Come cheer them on.

item.title: ABC RN: Top 100 Books of the 21st Century
item.description: ABC Radio National revealed the public’s Top 100 books of the 21st century over the weekend.

item.title: Seeking Acknowledgement of Country Presenters
item.description: Interested in delivering the Acknowledgement of Country at a Town Hall? Put your hand up.

item.title: Security Passes – Temporary & Lost Pass Process
item.description: Need a temp pass? See Floor Reception. Lost your pass? Email Sharon Dernehl. Keep passes secure.

item.title: Wellness Corner: Tips for a Healthier Workday
item.description: Stay hydrated and focused. Drink water on waking and keep a bottle with you during the day.

item.title: Internal Roles Open (G2–G5)
item.description: Open roles include Member Response (G3), Service Investigations (G2), Member Benefits (G2), BRT Lead (G4), Scheme Compliance (G3), Senior Financial Accountant (G5).

item.title: Nominate a Colleague Living Our Values (LOVE Awards)
item.description: Seen someone live our values? Send a quick nomination for a LeavePlus LOVE Award.

item.title: Got Feedback on this Update?
item.description: Help improve the Weekly Staff Update by sharing your feedback.
